1.0 (15 February 2008)

* First release.

1.1 (3 December 2008)

* Fixed problem with the plugin-generated URL to the Fancyzoom script.

1.2 (16 September 2009)

* Fixed problems with the JS that could affect Firefox 3.5. (see
  http://www.michaelvanallen.com/development/tweaking-fancyzoom-for-firefox-3-5/
  for details)
